name: nf-social-network-api-nosql
description: Build an API for a social network web application where users can share their thoughts, react to friends’ thoughts, and create a friend list. You’ll use ```Express.js``` for routing, a ```MongoDB database```, and the ```Mongoose ODM```. In addition to using the Express.js (Links to an external site.) and Mongoose (Links to an external site.) packages, you may also optionally use a JavaScript date library of your choice or the native JavaScript Date object to format timestamps.
